bill.title: Relating To Highway Safety.
bill.description: Clarifies the definition of "drug" in chapter 291E, Hawaii Revised Statutes, regarding the use of intoxicants while operating a vehicle. Takes effect 7/1/2035. (SD1)

history.action: Pending introduction.
Introduced and Pass First Reading.
Referred to TRN, JUD, referral sheet 9
Bill scheduled to be heard by TRN on Wednesday, 02-07-18 10:00AM in House conference room 423.

The committees on TRN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 6 Ayes: Representative(s) Aquino, Quinlan, Brower, Hashem, Nakamura, San Buenaventura; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) McDermott.
Reported from TRN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 354-18) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.
Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Souki excused (1).
Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Thursday, 03-01-18 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Nishimoto, San Buenaventura, Brower, C. Lee, Morikawa, Takayama, McDermott, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1083-18), recommending passage on Third Reading.
Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Woodson excused (1). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 337).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to TRE, JDC.
The committee(s) on TRE has scheduled a public hearing on 03-14-18 1:15PM in conference room 225.

The committee(s) on TRE recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in TRE were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Inouye, Shimabukuro; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Espero ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) English, Harimoto.
Reported from TRE (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3135) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading and referral to JDC.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading and referred to JDC.
The committee(s) on JDC will hold a public decision making on 04-05-18 10:45AM in conference room 016.

The committee(s) on JDC recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDC were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Taniguchi, K. Rhoads, Gabbard, L. Thielen; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Kim.
Reported from JDC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3594) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 1).
48 Hrs. Notice 04-10-18.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 1 (Senator(s) Harimoto). Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 724) in amended form (SD 1).
House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 608).
House Conferees Appointed: Aquino, Nishimoto Co-Chairs; Hashem, McDermott.
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 609).
